name: KickMaster
summary: Kick Master (also known as KickMaster) is an action game developed by KID and published by Taito Corporation for the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1992. The game has some role-playing game elements, such as leveling up, and is also one of the first NES games to feature parallax scrolling.
info:
• 中文名: 踢王
  • 开发: KID
  • 发行: Taito
  • 别名: Kick Master
  • 平台: FC
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1992年1月
